name: Today's Suspects
description:
Also playable at https://todayssuspects.com

Each day there is a new victim and five new suspects.

There is one murderer among the five suspects. The murderer will have a motive, own the weapon used to kill the victim, have been to the location before, and know the victim. Only the murderer is guilty in all four areas. The murderer will lie to try and profess their innocence.

There is also one accomplice among the five suspects. The accomplice is innocent, but will lie to make the murderer seem innocent too.

Together, the murderer and the accomplice will lie in an attempt to frame one of the three remaining suspects.

To win, you need to accuse the murderer, having asked as few questions as possible. You only have one attempt at an accusation.
